Articles.Content: Darn, no nomination. Oh well, I guess that's what I get for neglecting my channel for 2 months. :3

For best Up-And-Comer, I nominate Gordon Gillespie. His channel is at

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLciqlxZUjyOguwxMFNHjER-jY_4jHPC5x" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

For Showcase, I nominate his Better Than Starting Manned series, at

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLciqlxZUjyOi8Yi-E_V5ku2TfwwK22a84" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I will nominate HatBat's latest short film 'Invasion' for the best artistic video. It shows off some gorgeous visuals as well as thrilling action sequences, do check it out!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dagxe74VpMI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T18:19:37Z" title="04/27/2015 06:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by SuperHappySquid**
Neat.

Wait, last day alert! Astrogamer deleted all of the vids on his channel and started another called Astrogamer727! Change Astrogamer in the comedy category to Astrogamer727! Please?

EDIT: Could you please put Astrogamer727 in best channel overall and best up and coming channel also? And TryDyingToLive for best inactive channel?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T20:31:01Z" title="05/02/2015 08:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

Hey everyone!

So recently, I've been absolutely swamped. My computer has died, just as I was getting ready for finals. I've had a bunch of other nasty stuff happen. All in all, it hasn't been a very pleasant couple of weeks.

So, would you mind extending the deadlines for both judging applications and voting entries out about a week or two? Again, I'm sorry for all of the changes being made. I've just had a rough go of things recently.

My tentative new schedule is judging applications being due on May 10 and actual entries being due by the 20th. Hopefully this works with everyone.

And be sure to keep all of those entries coming! Trust me, this competition *will* get done, eventually.

Thanks.

-Upsilon

Sorry to hear that, Upsilon. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Take your time to get things in order. This is just a game after all. We'll still be around when you get things fixed up. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hey everyone!
> So recently, I've been absolutely swamped. My computer has died, just as I was getting ready for finals. I've had a bunch of other nasty stuff happen. All in all, it hasn't been a very pleasant couple of weeks.
>

Those dang *machines*. I swear, this is not the first time they've tried to take over! They always know the perfect time to fail, and its when you need them most. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

No problem at all on the extension, if anything, it is a good opportunity to get a few more noms in for lesser-viewed or new channels - red carpets for all!
Yay, an extension! I would love it. Would you please take my info in my last post here and add it in?
Why didn't I see this sooner? Oh well.

> 
> Wait, last day alert! Astrogamer deleted all of the vids on his channel and started another called Astrogamer727! Change Astrogamer in the comedy category to Astrogamer727! Please?
> EDIT: Could you please put Astrogamer727 in best channel overall and best up and coming channel also? And TryDyingToLive for best inactive channel?

Please.

I nominate **Vaos3712** as best artistic channel! 

Honestly, how he is not on this list is BEYOND me. 

His designs are incredible, he does fantastic instructional video's, and makes things I don't usually see in other channels. It's one of the very few KSP youtubers I've seen that is capable of being truly creative, without abusing game mechanics or mods, and achieving the same if not BETTER results than most other people. Just because of DUNA ONE alone he should be at the top of this list... 

He can be a bit dry, but by God he's the best one out there. 

Get him on this list because he deserves it, and then some! 

Link to his channel: [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCykjfgzqTHuYIhvUGz1Xezg](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCykjfgzqTHuYIhvUGz1Xezg)

And for best artistic video, I nominate Vaos' movie "Duna One" which he is still working on. But even the first part is worth a spot on here. 

Link to video:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/srv_H5T6xT0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Regards,

Funguspower

Is this still open?

I'd like to nominate my channel: [https://www.youtube.com/user/thecrazycarts](https://www.youtube.com/user/thecrazycarts) I really enjoy playing KSP, so I decided to do it on youtube! I would really appreciate it if you looked at my channel!

EDIT: Nominating for Up-and-Coming

Just trying to get people to reply

I nominate **SWDennis** for **Best KSP Channel Overall**

[http://www.youtube.com/user/SWDennis](https://www.youtube.com/user/SWDennis)

**KSP Single launch Jupiter moon Grand Tour in RSS** for **Best Video Overall**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1e43D6UYLBc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Kerbal Space Program- Ares: Voyage to Mars - RSS** for **Best Artistic Video**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/BmOngtvYrzc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**KSP:Stock System Grand Tour** for **Most Under-Watched Video**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/K97xXQnJapU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

You cant ... what ... you cant make a thread full of youtube links and not hide it from me ... I will have to click and watch everything!!! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

But I think the idea is great! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

For the young man's awesome voice alone I would like to nominate HOCgaming, but the real reason would be his Kerbal Polar Expedition to raise money for charity.

[https://my.charitywater.org/kerbal-polar-expedition-2](https://my.charitywater.org/kerbal-polar-expedition-2)

Although there is no category this might fit in, is there?

Quick update!

**All of your suggestions have been added to the OP!** Sorry for the delay.

**Judges have been chosen!** To wit, they are KasperVld, Hatbat, pandoras kitten, MisterFister, and Xacktar. I'll send the lot of them a PM as soon as I'm done with this post.

**There are five days left to submit your entries!** Be sure to do so soon. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks once again for partaking in this, and sorry for my recent lack of activity. It *will* pick back up again soon, okay?

-Upsilon

\*puts on his robe and curly-white-hair wig\*

Just call me...
